
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53500458">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 eel313 于 2025-7-23 14:47 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<font face="宋体"><font size="4">所需工具：acad2kml插件、Google Earth、AutoCAD</font></font><font face="宋体"><font size="4">acad2kml</font></font><br>
<font face="宋体"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="宋体"><font size="4">插件下载：</font></font><font color="#3f3f3f"><font style="background-color:rgb(208, 242, 195)"><font face="宋体"><font size="4">https://wwos.lanzoub.com/iKTS831ovuoj，</font></font></font></font><font color="#3f3f3f"><font face="宋体"><font size="4">蓝奏连接失效后可留言，更新下载地址</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font style="color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85)"><font face="宋体"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font></font><font face="宋体"><font size="4">Google Earth、AutoCAD安装教程不在赘述，本人使用CAD为2020版，</font></font><br>
<br>
<font face="宋体"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><font face="宋体"><font size="4">欢迎大家提意见！！！</font></font><br>
<font face="宋体"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="宋体"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">1</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">、用</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">AutoCAD</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">打开所需导入的图纸。</font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_HK73W" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/npe1dt.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/npe1dt.png"><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">2</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">、设置原点坐标。在</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">AutoCAD</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">中输入命令</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">“UCS”</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">，然后回车</font></font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_J2fUg" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/npuze7.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/npuze7.png"><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">3</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">、选择参照点位置，左键单击参照点（需知道该点的经纬度），设置</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">X</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">，</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">Y</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">坐标方向，然后回车。</font></font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_x0q8j" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="726" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nq2oq5.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nq2oq5.png"><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">4</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">、</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">AutoCAD</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">中依次点击“管理”、“加载应用程序”，选择</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">acad2kml</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">插件并加载</font></font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_IKan9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="625" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nqiq3y.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nqiq3y.png"><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">5</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">、加载完成后，在</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">AutoCAD</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">中输入命令</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">“A2K”</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">，然后回车。弹出对话框中填写参照点的经纬度（可从</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">Google Earth</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">中获取，方法：依次点击“工具”、“选项”，弹出的对话框中“显示纬度</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">/</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">经度”选择“小数度数”，然后点击确定，在</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">Google Earth</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">软件右下方显示光标所在点的经纬度，记录备用），对话框中的“其他设定”均取消勾选，数字不用改动，</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">AutoCAD</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">基本绘图单位选择“米”，点击确定，弹出保存对话框，命名并选择保存位置，点击确定。</font></font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_n7fqf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="675" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nqoqrl.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nqoqrl.png"><img id="aimg_mQMOc" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nqoovn.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nqoovn.png"><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">6</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">、上述操作完成后</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">AutoCAD</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">为“选择对象”的命令，选择需要转化的图形，并回车，等待处理，完成后可在第</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">5</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">步选择的保存位置中找到</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">kml</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">的文件。</font></font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_u7sMz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nrkia7.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nrkia7.png"><img id="aimg_jjPNS" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nrnm8t.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nrnm8t.png"><img id="aimg_dCFbA" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nrql5h.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nrql5h.png"><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">7</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">、找到生成的</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">kml</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">文件后，右键选择以“记事本”方式打开，将</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">encoding</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">后引号内改为</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">"UTF-8"</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">，然后依次点击“文件”、“另存为”，在弹出的对话框中选择保存位置并命名，保存类型选择“所有文件”，编码选择：</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">"UTF-8"</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">，然后点击保存。</font></font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_RhVZJ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/ns6bc2.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/ns6bc2.png"><img id="aimg_tEGNB" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="534" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/6ltq3iw.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/6ltq3iw.png"><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">8</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">、找到保存的文件，双击在</font></font><font face="&amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">Google Earth</font></font><font face="宋体"><font style="font-size:14.0pt">中打开，将此文件保存到“我的位置”以备下次使用。</font></font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_tZWqP" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nshvvg.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://uy.wzznft.com/i/2025/07/23/nshvvg.png"><br>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
